  2. US stock futures fall as Trump’s tariffs threaten a dangerous trade war  CNN
  3. Stock market today: S&P 500, Nasdaq, Dow futures retreat after Trump delivers his tariff salvoes  Yahoo Finance
  4. Tariffs Catch Traders Off Guard. Why Stock Markets Are Still Misjudging Trump and 5 Other Things to Know Today.  Barron's
  5. Stocks and bond yields slip as Trump tariffs ignite new trade conflicts  Reuters
